title: Red Bull Rampage is back for 2021, here’s who’s riding
content:
After a nearly two year hiatus, Red Bull Rampage is back for its 20th Anniversary Edition. Southwestern, Utah, will once again play host to some of the gnarliest riding you’re ever likely to watch, with a star-studded list of entrants crafting their own unique lines from the near vertical sandstone ridges. When is it? October […]

The post Red Bull Rampage is back for 2021, here’s who’s riding appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
